EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Colby Harper (1336753512.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Colby, Thanks so much for the update, we will keep in touch! Have a great weekend!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Colby Harper [mailto:cjharper@u.washington.edu] Sent: Friday, May 11, 2012 2:11 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Colby Harper Hi Sara,
Thanks for checking in. The new Clearwire contract effort is on hold for now. Given some of the strategic delays Clearwire had, I couldn't wait on one of my current client's projects. Still talking with Clearwire, though now timing is TBD.
Will still be going MBO as Clearwire develops though, so I'd welcome the occasional ping from you.
Regards,
ColbyOn Thu, May 10, 2012 at 7:37 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello Colby, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going? Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: - There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one:
http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xMzYmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTEzNiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODc2MzImc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ3MTkzNDMmZW1haWxpZD1jamhhcnBlckB1Lndhc2hpbmd0b24uZWR1JnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMTc5Ny0xMTAxNTQ5JmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uwsXKO%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> - MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, there’s real hard facts about The State of Independence in America <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xMzYmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTEzNiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODc2MzImc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ3MTkzNDMmZW1haWxpZD1jamhhcnBlckB1Lndhc2hpbmd0b24uZWR1JnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMTc5Ny0xMTAxNTQ5JmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uwsXKO%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent.
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com <tel:703-793-6028>
